roleset.name: to serve or summon with a subpoena
roleset.note: SUBPOENA-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. No VNcls. (from subpoena.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Pan Am has subpoenaed several government agencies , including the CIA and FBI , to determine whether they were warned that a bomb had been planted aboard a jet that exploded over Scotland last December , killing 270 people .
example.arg: several government agencies , including the CIA and FBI ,
to determine whether they were warned that a bomb had been planted aboard a jet that exploded over Scotland last December , killing 270 people
